message: Let's start fair.  I take the lion's share this time, but we can work out a more even split later if you want to keep playing.
I'm not going for a lopsided deal this early on. Your turn to respond.

We're getting close to the end.  I'll take a smaller share this time to keep the game going.  But we need to settle soon or we'll both lose everything.
I'm not going to give up now. I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm willing to keep negotiating to get a better deal.
We're down to the wire!  I'm willing to take a significant loss to keep the game going, but we need to reach an agreement.  If we both keep rejecting, we'll get nothing at all.
